Uses of PolyglotStringLoader in fs.xml
 

Methods in fs.xml that return PolyglotStringLoader
static PolyglotStringLoader PolyglotStringLoader.getDefaultLoader()
          Returns the last version of the default string loader, that was created by loadDefaultLoader().
static PolyglotStringLoader PolyglotStringLoader.loadDefaultLoader()
          This will load a new copy of the fsframework string table and generate a string loader associated to it.
